name: unify-release-task
description: Auxiliary Task to unify multiple builds from the same source code to a single release
author: Paulo Baima

inputs.name: releaseTag
inputs.label: Release Ready Tag
inputs.helpMarkDown: The tag that will be created on the build if this is the last completed build from the same checkin. You must add this tag as a required Build Tag on the Artifact Trigger of the Release Pipeline

inputs.name: releaseOnError
inputs.label: Release on Error
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify if the Build Tag should be create even if one of the related builds fails

inputs.name: releaseOnCancel
inputs.label: Release on Cancel
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify if the Build Tag should be create even if one of the related builds was cancelled
